subject: Re: new mini box files from 1-7-08 (mike & lisa tell me the phone is ringing)
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
A couple files were a bit rough and i commented on the ones i heard.  
If we can get 2 or 3 really good files from a session i consider it a 
success.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> hey guy's these are some minibox files I got from a session based 
on 
> technical questions. But I did recieve general messages also, and 
have 
> only gotten 2 minutes into a 12 minute recording.
> 
> Check out the one where mike and lisa both tell me the phone is 
ringing 
> and you hear the phone in the background. very cool.
> 
> Bruce
>
